person.persName: John B. Slaton (Hopkins County,. Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky native. Son of James Slaton and Elizabeth Bailey Slaton. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.
